Text:
Version 1.8.2 changelog

*Database 2.0 : according to FIFA Official Update 12/04
*Database 4.0 :
- Added new teams to Rest of Europe : Maribor and Partizan.
- Added new national teams : Gabon, Zambia, Congo DR, Israel, Estonia, Albania, Cyprus, Latvia, Lithuania, Iceland
- Added stadiums names for all teams
- Major updates in structure
* Added African Cup of Nations added to Career Mode ( DB 4.0 ) and Tournaments Mode
* Camp Nou by BFL Team ( bfl-team.com ) . Assigned to FC Barcelona ( Database 2.0 and 4.0 )
* New Boots
- Nike Mercurial Vapor IX FG - CR7 Summer Collection
- Nike Mercurial Vapor IX FG - Purple/LimeGreen/Black
- Nike Mercurial Vapor IX SG - Purple/LimeGreen/Black
- Nike Mercurial Vapor IX SG - Fireberry/Green/RedPlume/White
- Nike Mercurial Vapor IX SG - Sunset/Volt/TotalCrimson/Black
- Nike Mercurial Vapor IX SG - Gold/Citron/Volt
- Nike Tiempo Legend IV Elite - White/Blue/Metallic Silver
- Nike Tiempo Legend IV Elite - Black/White/Metallic Gold
- Nike Tiempo Legend IV Elite - LightBone/Black/Volt
- Nike Tiempo Legend IV Elite- Dark Charcoal/Black/Orange
- Joma Fit 100 - White/Orange
- Joma Fit 100 - Blue/Green
- Joma Power - Blue/Yellow
- Nike Mercurial Vapor IX model, bump and reflex updated
* Kits for all new teams added
* Kits and Badges for all Ekstraklasa teams
* Adboards for all Bundesliga Teams
* New Balls
- Adidas Fevernova
- Adidas Roteiro Euro 2004
- Nike Total 90 Aerow Red White
- Nike Total 90 Aerow Yellow Blue
- Adidas Finale Wembley 2013
- Adidas Katlego 2013
* New Faces
